title: Repo sync

details: Added documentation stating that the Copilot coding agent uses a fixed AI model determined by GitHub, which cannot be changed by users.
Clarified that this model does not inherit selections made for Copilot Chat, highlighting a key limitation.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added documentation stating that the Copilot coding agent uses a fixed AI model determined by GitHub, which cannot be changed by users.
- Clarified that this model does not inherit selections made for Copilot Chat, highlighting a key limitation.

### Title
Document fixed AI model for Copilot coding agent
